intro: Diodella rigida, commonly known as the rigid diodella, is a flowering plant native to certain regions of Africa. The plant produces clusters of small, tubular flowers that are typically pink or purple in color. It thrives in moist, well-drained soils and is often found in forest understories or along stream banks. Due to its ornamental value, it is occasionally cultivated in botanical gardens and greenhouses.
